original: sugirā cittahāriṇyā paśyantyā dṛśyamānayā /
analyzed: su girā citta hāriṇyā paśyantyā dṛśyamānayā

original: jayaty ullāsitānanda- mahimā parameśvaraḥ // BhStc_1 //
analyzed: jayati ullāsita ānanda mahimā parameśvaraḥ

original: yaḥ sphītaḥ śrīdayābodha- paramānandasampadā /
analyzed: yaḥ sphītaḥ śrī dayā bodha parama ānanda sampadā

original: vidyoddyotitamāhātmyaḥ sa jayaty aparājitaḥ // BhStc_2 //
analyzed: vidyā uddyotita māhātmyaḥ sa jayati aparājitaḥ

original: prasaradbindunādāya śuddhāmṛtamayātmane /
analyzed: prasarat bindu nādāya śuddha amṛta maya ātmane

original: namo 'nantaprakāśāya śaṃkarakṣīrasindhave // BhStc_3 //
analyzed: namaḥ nanta prakāśāya śaṃkara kṣīra sindhave

original: dviṣmas tvāṃ tvāṃ stumas tubhyaṃ mantrayāmo 'mbikāpate /
analyzed: dviṣmaḥ tvām tvām stumaḥ tubhyam mantrayāmaḥ mbikāpate

original: ativāllabhyataḥ sādhu viśvaṅ no dhṛtavān asi // BhStc_4 //
analyzed: ati vāllabhyataḥ sādhu viśvak naḥ dhṛtavān asi

original: saṃhṛtasparśayogāya sampūrṇāmṛtasūtaye /
analyzed: saṃhṛta sparśa yogāya sampūrṇa amṛta sūtaye

original: viyanmāyāsvarūpāya vibhave śambhave namaḥ // BhStc_5 //
analyzed: viyat māyā svarūpāya vibhave śambhave namaḥ

original: bhinneṣv api na bhinnaṃ yac chinneṣv achinnam eva ca /
analyzed: bhinneṣu api na bhinnam yat chinneṣu a chinnam eva ca

original: namāmaḥ sarvasāmānyaṃ rūpaṃ tat pārameśvaram // BhStc_6 //
analyzed: namāmaḥ sarva sāmānyam rūpam tat pārameśvaram

original: praṇavordhvārdhamātrāto 'py aṇave mahate punaḥ /
analyzed: pi aṇave mahate punar

original: brahmāṇḍād api nairguṇya- guṇāya sthāṇave namaḥ // BhStc_7 //
analyzed: brahmāṇḍāt api nairguṇya guṇāya sthāṇave namaḥ

original: brahmāṇḍagarbhiṇīṃ vyoma- vyāpinaḥ sarvatogateḥ /
analyzed: brahmāṇḍa garbhiṇīm vyoma vyāpinaḥ sarvatogateḥ

original: parameśvarahaṃsasya śaktiṃ haṃsīm iva stumaḥ // BhStc_8 //
analyzed: parameśvara haṃsasya śaktim haṃsīm iva stumaḥ

original: nirupādānasambhāram abhittāv eva tanvate /
analyzed: nirupādāna sambhāram abhittau eva tanvate

original: jagaccitraṃ namas tasmai kalāślāghyāya śūline // BhStc_9 //
analyzed: jagat citram namaḥ tasmai kalā ślāghyāya śūline

original: māyājalodarāt samyag uddhṛtya vimalīkṛtam /
analyzed: māyā jala udarāt samyak uddhṛtya vimalīkṛtam

original: śivajñānaṃ svato dugdhaṃ dehy ehi harahaṃsa naḥ // BhStc_10 //
ṣaṭpramāṇīpariccheda- bhedayoge 'py abhedine /
analyzed: bheda yoge abhedine

original: paramārthaikabhāvāya baliṃ yāmo bhavāya te // BhStc_11 //
analyzed: paramārtha eka bhāvāya balim yāmaḥ bhavāya te

original: api paśyema gambhīrāṃ pareṇa jyotiṣābhitaḥ /
analyzed: api paśyema gambhīrām pareṇa jyotiṣā abhitas

original: unmṛṣṭatamasaṃ ramyām antarbhava bhavadguhām // BhStc_12 //
analyzed: unmṛṣṭa tamasam ramyām antarbhava bhavat guhām

original: namas tebhyo 'pi ye soma- kalākalitaśekharam /
analyzed: namaḥ tebhyaḥ pi ye soma kalā kalita śekharam

original: nāthaṃ svapne 'pi paśyanti paramānandadāyinam // BhStc_13 //
analyzed: nātham svapne pi paśyanti parama ānanda dāyinam

original: bhagavan bhava bhāvatkaṃ bhāvaṃ bhāvayituṃ ruciḥ /
analyzed: bhagavan bhava bhāvatkam bhāvam bhāvayitum ruciḥ

original: punarbhavabhayoccheda- dakṣā kasmai na rocate // BhStc_14 //
analyzed: punarbhava bhaya uccheda dakṣā kasmai na rocate

original: yāvajjīvaṃ jagannātha kartavyam idam astu naḥ /
analyzed: yāvajjīvam jagannātha kartavyam idam astu naḥ

original: tvatprasādāt tvadekāgra- manaskatvena yā sthitiḥ // BhStc_15 //
analyzed: tvad prasādāt tvad ekāgra manaska tvena yā sthitiḥ

original: śākhāsahasravistīrṇa- vedāgamamayātmane /
analyzed: śākhā sahasra vistīrṇa veda āgama maya ātmane

original: namo 'nantaphalotpāda- kalpavṛkṣāya śambhave // BhStc_16 //
analyzed: namaḥ nanta phala utpāda kalpavṛkṣāya śambhave

original: vāṅmanaḥkāyakarmāṇi viniyojya tvayi prabho /
analyzed: vāc manaḥ kāya karmāṇi viniyojya tvayi prabho

original: tvanmayībhūya nirdvandvāḥ kaccit syāmāpi karhicit // BhStc_17 //
analyzed: tvanmayībhūya nirdvandvāḥ kaccit syāma api karhicit

original: jagatāṃ sargasaṃhāra- tattaddhitaniyuktiṣu /
analyzed: jagatām sarga saṃhāra tad tad hita niyuktiṣu

original: ananyāpekṣasāmarthya- śālini śūline namaḥ // BhStc_18 //
analyzed: an anya apekṣa sāmarthya śālini śūline namaḥ

original: vyatītaguṇayogasya mukhyadhyeyasya dhūrjaṭeḥ /
analyzed: vyatīta guṇa yogasya mukhya dhyeyasya dhūrjaṭeḥ

original: nāmāpi dhyāyatāṃ dhyānaiḥ kim anyālambanaiḥ phalam // BhStc_19 //
analyzed: nāma api dhyāyatām dhyānaiḥ kim anya ālambanaiḥ phalam

original: namo namaḥ śivāyeti mantrasāmarthyam āśritāḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ śivāya iti mantra sāmarthyam āśritāḥ

original: ślāghyās te śāmbhavīṃ bhūtim upabhoktuṃ ya udyatāḥ // BhStc_20 //
analyzed: ślāghyāḥ te śāmbhavīm bhūtim upabhoktum ye udyatāḥ

original: kaḥ panthā yena na prāpyaḥ kā ca vāṅ nocyase yayā /
analyzed: kaḥ panthāḥ yena na prāpyaḥ kā ca vāc na ucyase yayā

original: kiṃ dhyānaṃ yena na dhyeyaḥ kiṃ vā kiṃ nāsi yat prabho // BhStc_21 //
analyzed: kim dhyānam yena na dhyeyaḥ kim vā kim nā asi yat prabho

original: arcito 'yam ayaṃ dhyāta eṣa toṣita ity ayam /
analyzed: arcitaḥ yam ayam dhyātaḥ eṣa toṣitaḥ iti ayam

original: rasaḥ srotaḥsahasreṇa tvayi me bhava vardhatām // BhStc_22 //
analyzed: rasaḥ srotaḥ sahasreṇa tvayi me bhava vardhatām

original: namo niḥśeṣadhīpatri- mālālayamayātmane /
analyzed: namaḥ niḥśeṣa dhī patri mālā ālaya maya ātmane

original: nāthāya sthāṇave tubhyaṃ nāgayajñopavītine // BhStc_23 //
analyzed: nāthāya sthāṇave tubhyam nāga yajña upavītine

original: ajñānatimirasyaikam auṣadhaṃ saṃsmṛtis tava /
analyzed: ajñāna timirasya ekam auṣadham saṃsmṛtiḥ tava

original: bhava tattatpradānena prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ mayi // BhStc_24 //
analyzed: bhava tad tad pradānena prasādaḥ kriyatām mayi

original: nama īśāya niḥśeṣa- puruṣārthaprasādhakaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ īśāya niḥśeṣa puruṣa artha prasādhakaḥ

original: praṇantavyaḥ praṇāmo 'pi yadīya iha dhīmatām // BhStc_25 //
analyzed: praṇantavyaḥ yadi iyaḥ iha dhīmatām

original: magnair bhīme bhavāmbhodhau nilaye duḥkhayādasām /
analyzed: magnaiḥ bhīme bhava ambhodhau nilaye duḥkha yādasām

original: bhakticintāmaṇiṃ śārvaṃ tataḥ prāpya na kiṃ jitam // BhStc_26 //
analyzed: bhakti cintāmaṇim śārvam tatas prāpya na kim jitam

original: nirāvaraṇanirdvandva- niścalajñānasampadām /
jñeyo 'si kila ke 'py ete ye tvāṃ jānanti dhūrjaṭe // BhStc_27 //
analyzed: jñeyaḥ si kila ke pi ete ye tvām jānanti dhūrjaṭe

original: nirguṇo 'pi guṇajñānāṃ jñeya eko jayaty ajaḥ /
analyzed: nirguṇaḥ pi guṇa jñānām jñeyaḥ ekaḥ jayati ajaḥ

original: niṣkāmo 'pi prakṛtyā yaḥ kāmanānāṃ paraṃ phalam // BhStc_28 //
analyzed: niṣkāmaḥ prakṛtyāḥ yaḥ kāmanānām param phalam

original: śrīratnāmṛtalābhāya kliṣṭaṃ yatra na kaiḥ suraiḥ /
analyzed: śrī ratna amṛta lābhāya kliṣṭam yatra na kaiḥ suraiḥ

original: tat kṣīrodadam aiśvaryaṃ tavaiva sahajaṃ vibho // BhStc_29 //
analyzed: tat kṣīroda dam aiśvaryam tava eva sahajam vibho

original: namo bhaktyā nṛṇāṃ muktyai bhavate bhava te 'vate /
analyzed: namaḥ bhaktyā nṛṇām muktyai bhavate bhava te vate

original: smṛtyā nutyā ca dadate śambhave śaṃ bhave 'bhave // BhStc_30 //
analyzed: smṛtyā nutyā ca dadate śambhave śam bhave bhave

original: sarvajñaḥ sarvakṛt sarvam asīti jñānaśālinām /
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ sarva kṛt sarvam asi iti jñāna śālinām

original: vedyaṃ kiṃ karma vā nātha nānantyāya tvayārpyate // BhStc_31 //
analyzed: vedyam kim karma vā nātha na ānantyāya tvayā arpyate

original: icchāyā eva yasyeyat phalaṃ lokatrayātmakam /
analyzed: icchāyāḥ eva yasya iyat phalam loka traya ātmakam

original: tasya te nātha kāryāṇāṃ ko vetti kiyatī gatiḥ // BhStc_32 //
analyzed: tasya te nātha kāryāṇām kaḥ vetti kiyatī gatiḥ

original: brahmādayo 'pi tad yasya karmasopānamālayā /
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ pi tat yasya karma sopāna mālayā

original: upary upari dhāvanti labdhuṃ dhāma namāmi tam // BhStc_33 //
analyzed: upari upari dhāvanti labdhum dhāma namāmi tam

original: ayaṃ brahmā mahendro 'yaṃ sūryācandramasāv imau /
analyzed: ayam brahmā mahā indraḥ yam sūryācandramasau imau

original: iti śaktilatā yasya puṣpitā pātv asau bhavaḥ // BhStc_34 //
analyzed: iti śakti latā yasya puṣpitā pātu asau bhavaḥ

original: bhramo na labhyate yasya bhrāntāntaḥkaraṇair api /
analyzed: bhramaḥ na labhyate yasya bhrānta antaḥkaraṇaiḥ api

original: dūragair api yasyānto durgam astaṃ stumo mṛḍam // BhStc_35 //
analyzed: dūra gaiḥ api yasya antar durgam astam stumaḥ mṛḍam

original: namaḥ stutau smṛtau dhyāne darśane sparśane tathā /
analyzed: namaḥ stutau smṛtau dhyāne darśane sparśane tathā

original: prāptau cānandavṛndāya dayitāya kapardine // BhStc_36 //
analyzed: prāptau ca ānanda vṛndāya dayitāya kapardine

original: kiṃ smayeneti matvāpi manasā parameśvara /
analyzed: kim smayena iti matvā api manasā parameśvara

original: smayena tvanmayo 'smīti māmi nātmani kiṃ mudā // BhStc_37 //
analyzed: smayena smi iti na ātmani kim mudā

original: cintayitvāpi kartavya- koṭīś cittasya cāpalāt /
analyzed: cintayitvā api koṭīḥ cittasya cāpalāt

original: viśrāmyan bhava bhāvatka- cittānande rame bhṛśam // BhStc_38 //
analyzed: viśrāmyan bhava bhāvatka citta ānande rame bhṛśam

original: sūkṣmo 'pi cet trilokīyaṃ kalāmātraṃ kathaṃ tava /
analyzed: ced trilokī iyam kalā mātram katham tava

original: sthūlo 'tha kiṃ sudarśo na brahmādibhir api prabho // BhStc_39 //
analyzed: kim sudarśaḥ na brahma ādibhiḥ api prabho

original: vācya eṣāṃ tvam eveti nābhaviṣyad idaṃ yadi /
analyzed: vācyaḥ eṣām tvam evā iti na abhaviṣyat idam yadi

original: kaḥ kleśaṃ deva vāgjāleṣv akariṣyat sudhīs tadā // BhStc_40 //
analyzed: kaḥ kleśam deva vāc jāleṣu akariṣyat sudhīḥ tadā

original: krameṇa karmaṇā kena kayā vā prajñayā prabho /
analyzed: krameṇa karmaṇā kena kayā vā prajñayā prabho

original: dṛśyo 'sīty upadeśena prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ mama // BhStc_41 //
analyzed: dṛśyaḥ si iti upadeśena prasādaḥ kriyatām mama

original: namo nirupakāryāya trailokyaikopakāriṇe /
analyzed: namaḥ nirupakāryāya trailokya eka upakāriṇe

original: sarvasya spṛhaṇīyāya niḥspṛhāya kapardine // BhStc_42 //
analyzed: sarvasya spṛhaṇīyāya niḥspṛhāya kapardine

original: aho kṣetrajñatā seyaṃ kāryāya mahate satām /
analyzed: aho kṣetrajña tā sā iyam kāryāya mahate satām

original: yayānantaphalāṃ bhaktiṃ vapanti tvayy amī prabho // BhStc_43 //
analyzed: yayā ananta phalām bhaktim vapanti tvayi amī prabho

original: mahatīyam aho māyā tava māyin yayāvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: mahatī iyam aho māyā tava māyin yayā avṛtaḥ

original: tvaddhyānanidhilābhe 'pi mugdho lokaḥ ślathāyate // BhStc_44 //
analyzed: tvad dhyāna nidhi lābhe pi mugdhaḥ lokaḥ ślathāyate

original: ārambhe bhava sarvatra karma vā karaṇādi vā /
analyzed: ārambhe bhava sarvatra karma vā karaṇa ādi vā

original: viśvam astu svatantras tu kartā tatraikako bhavān // BhStc_45 //
analyzed: viśvam astu svatantraḥ tu kartā tatra ekakaḥ bhavān

original: triguṇatriparispanda- dvandvagrastaṃ jagattrayam /
analyzed: triguṇa tri parispanda dvandva grastam jagattrayam

original: uddhartuṃ bhavato 'nyasya kasya śaktiḥ kṛpāthavā // BhStc_46 //
analyzed: uddhartum bhavataḥ nyasya kasya śaktiḥ kṛpā athavā

original: doṣo 'pideva ko doṣas tvām āptuṃ yaḥ samāsthitaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ doṣaḥ tvām āptum yaḥ samāsthitaḥ

original: guṇo 'pi ca guṇaḥ ko nu tvāṃ nāptuṃ yaḥ samāsthitaḥ // BhStc_47 //
analyzed: ca guṇaḥ kaḥ nu tvām na āptum yaḥ samāsthitaḥ

original: rāgo 'py astu jagannātha mama tvayy eva yaḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: astu jagannātha mama tvayi eva yaḥ sthitaḥ

original: lobhāyāpi namas tasmai tvallābhālambanāya me // BhStc_47 //
analyzed: lobhāya api namaḥ tasmai tvad lābha ālambanāya me

original: aho mahad idaṃ karma deva tvadbhāvanātmakam /
analyzed: aho mahat idam karma deva tvad bhāvanā ātmakam

original: ābrahmakrimi yasmin no muktaye 'dhikriyeta kaḥ // BhStc_48 //
analyzed: ā brahmakrimi yasmin naḥ muktaye kaḥ

original: ārambhaḥ sarvakāryāṇāṃ paryantaḥ sarvakarmaṇām /
analyzed: ārambhaḥ sarva kāryāṇām paryantaḥ sarva karmaṇām

original: tadantarvṛttayaś citrās tavaiveśo dhiyaḥ pathi // BhStc_49 //
analyzed: tad antar vṛttayaḥ citrāḥ tava eva īśaḥ dhiyaḥ pathi

original: yāvad uttaram āsvāda- sahasraguṇavistaraḥ /
analyzed: yāvat uttaram āsvāda sahasraguṇa vistaraḥ

original: tvadbhaktirasapīyūṣān nātha nānyatra dṛśyate // BhStc_50 //
analyzed: tvad bhakti rasa pīyūṣāt nātha na anyatra dṛśyate

original: upasaṃhṛtakāmāya kāmāyatim atanvate /
analyzed: upasaṃhṛta kāmāya kāma āyatim a tanvate

original: avataṃsitasomāya somāya svāmine namaḥ // BhStc_51 //
analyzed: avataṃsita somāya somāya svāmine namaḥ

original: kim aśaktaḥ karomīti sarvatrānadhyavasyataḥ /
analyzed: kim aśaktaḥ karomi iti sarvatra anadhyavasyataḥ

original: sarvānugrāhikā śaktiḥ śāṃkarī śaraṇaṃ mama // BhStc_52 //
analyzed: sarva anugrāhikā śaktiḥ śāṃkarī śaraṇam mama

original: guṇātītasya nirdiṣṭa- niḥśeṣātiśayātmanaḥ /
analyzed: guṇa atītasya nirdiṣṭa niḥśeṣa atiśaya ātmanaḥ

original: labhyate bhava kutrāṃśe paraḥ pratinidhis tava // BhStc_53 //
analyzed: labhyate bhava kutra aṃśe paraḥ pratinidhiḥ tava

original: nirdvandve nirupādhau ca tvayy ātmani sati prabho /
analyzed: nirdvandve nirupādhau ca tvayi ātmani sati prabho

original: vayaṃ vañcyāmahe 'dyāpi māyayāmeyayā tava // BhStc_54 //
analyzed: vayam vañcyāmahe māyayā ameyayā tava

original: aṇimādiguṇāvāptiḥ sadaiśvaryaṃ bhavakṣayaḥ /
amī bhava bhavadbhakti- kalpapādapapallavāḥ // BhStc_55 //
analyzed: amī bhava bhavat bhakti kalpapādapa pallavāḥ

original: yā yā dik tatra na kvāsi sarvaḥ kālo bhavanmayaḥ /
analyzed: yā yā diś tatra na kva asi sarvaḥ kālaḥ bhavat mayaḥ

original: iti labdho 'pi karhi tvaṃ lapsyase nātha kathyatām // BhStc_56 //
analyzed: iti karhi tvam lapsyase nātha kathyatām

original: namaḥ prasannasadvṛtta- mānasaikanivāsine /
analyzed: namaḥ prasanna sat vṛtta mānasa eka nivāsine

original: bhūribhūtisitāṅgāya mahāhaṃsāya śambhave // BhStc_57 //
analyzed: bhūribhūti sita aṅgāya mahāhaṃsāya śambhave

original: hṛtoddhatatamastāntiḥ pluṣṭāśeṣabhavendhanā /
analyzed: hṛta uddhata tamaḥ tāntiḥ pluṣṭa aśeṣa bhava indhanā

original: tvadbodhadīpikā me 'stu nātha tvadbhaktidīpikā // BhStc_58 //
analyzed: tvad bodha dīpikā me stu nātha tvad bhakti dīpikā

original: visṛṣṭānekasadbīja- garbhaṃ trailokyanāṭakam /
analyzed: visṛṣṭa aneka sat bīja garbham trailokya nāṭakam

original: prastāvya hara saṃhartuṃ tvattaḥ ko 'nyaḥ kaviḥ kṣamaḥ // BhStc_59 //
analyzed: prastāvya hara saṃhartum tvattaḥ kaḥ nyaḥ kaviḥ kṣamaḥ

original: namaḥ sadasatāṃ kartum asattvaṃ sattvam eva vā /
analyzed: namaḥ sat asatām kartum asattvam sattvam eva vā

original: svatantrāyāsvatantrāya vyayaiśvaryaikaśāline // BhStc_60 //
analyzed: svatantrāya asvatantrāya vyaya aiśvarya eka śāline

original: trailokye 'py atra yo yāvān ānandaḥ kaścid īkṣyate /
analyzed: trailokye pi atra yaḥ yāvān ānandaḥ kaścid īkṣyate

original: sa bindur yasya taṃ vande devam ānandasāgaram // BhStc_61 //
analyzed: sa binduḥ yasya tam vande devam ānanda sāgaram

original: aho brahmādayo dhanyā ye vimuktānyasaṃkatham /
analyzed: aho brahma ādayaḥ dhanyāḥ ye vimukta anya saṃkatham

original: namo namaḥ śivāyeti japanty āhlādavihvalāḥ // BhStc_62 //
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ śivāya iti japanti āhlāda vihvalāḥ

original: niṣkāmāyāpi kāmānām anantānāṃ vidhāyine /
analyzed: niṣkāmāya api kāmānām anantānām vidhāyine

original: anāditve 'pi viśvasya bhoktre bhava namo 'stu te // BhStc_63 //
analyzed: anādi tve pi viśvasya bhoktre bhava namaḥ stu te

original: stumas tribhuvanārambha- mūlaprakṛtim īśvaram /
analyzed: stumaḥ tribhuvana ārambha mūlaprakṛtim īśvaram

original: lipseran nopakāraṃ ke yataḥ sampūrṇadharmaṇaḥ // BhStc_64 //
analyzed: lipseran nā upakāram ke yatas sampūrṇa dharmaṇaḥ

original: mahatsv apy arthakṛcchreṣu mohaughamalinīkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: mahatsu api artha kṛcchreṣu moha ogha malinīkṛtāḥ

original: smṛte yasmin prasīdanti matayas taṃ śivaṃ stumaḥ // BhStc_65 //
analyzed: smṛte yasmin prasīdanti matayaḥ tam śivam stumaḥ

original: prabho bhavata eveha prabhuśaktir abhaṅgurā /
analyzed: prabho bhavataḥ evā iha prabhu śaktiḥ abhaṅgurā

original: yadicchayā pratāyete trailokyasya layodayau // BhStc_66 //
analyzed: yat icchayā pratāyete trailokyasya laya udayau

original: kukarmāpi yam uddiśya devaṃ syāt sukṛtaṃ param /
analyzed: ku karmā api yam uddiśya devam syāt sukṛtam param

original: sukṛtasyāpi saukṛtyaṃ yato 'nyatra na so 'si bhoḥ // BhStc_67 //
analyzed: sukṛtasya api saukṛtyam yatas nyatra na saḥ si bhoḥ

original: eṣa muṣṭyā gṛhīto 'si dṛṣṭa eṣa kva yāsi naḥ /
analyzed: eṣa muṣṭyā gṛhītaḥ u si dṛṣṭaḥ eṣa kva yāsi naḥ

original: iti bhaktirasādhmātā dhanyā dhāvanti dhūrjaṭim // BhStc_68 //
analyzed: iti bhakti rasa ādhmātāḥ dhanyāḥ dhāvanti dhūrjaṭim

original: stumas tvām ṛgyajuḥsāmnāṃ śukrataḥ parataḥ param /
analyzed: stumaḥ tvām ṛk yajuḥ sāmnām śukrataḥ paratas param

original: yasya vedātmikājñeyam aho gambhīrasundarī // BhStc_69 //
analyzed: yasya veda ātmikā ajñeyam aho gambhīra sundarī

original: vidhir ādis tathānto 'si viśvasya parameśvara /
analyzed: vidhiḥ ādiḥ tathā antaḥ si viśvasya parama īśvara

original: dharmagrāmaḥ pravṛtto yas tvatto na sa kuto bhavet // BhStc_70 //
analyzed: dharma grāmaḥ pravṛttaḥ yaḥ tvattaḥ na sa kutas bhavet

original: namas te bhavasambhrānta- bhrāntim udbhāvya bhindate /
analyzed: namaḥ te bhava sambhrānta bhrāntim udbhāvya bhindate

original: jñānānandaṃ ca nirdvandvaṃ deva vṛtvā vivṛṇvate // BhStc_71 //
analyzed: jñāna ānandam ca nirdvandvam deva vṛtvā vivṛṇvate

original: yasyāḥ prāpyeta paryanta- viśeṣaḥ kair manorathaiḥ /
analyzed: yasyāḥ prāpyeta paryanta viśeṣaḥ kaiḥ manorathaiḥ

original: māyām ekanimeṣeṇa muṣṇaṃs tāṃ pātu naḥ śivaḥ // BhStc_72 //
analyzed: māyām eka nimeṣeṇa muṣṇan tām pātu naḥ śivaḥ

original: vairāgyasya gatiṃ gurvīṃ jñānasya paramāṃ śriyam /
analyzed: vairāgyasya gatim gurvīm jñānasya paramām śriyam

original: naiḥspṛhyasya parāṃ koṭiṃ bibhratāṃ tvaṃ prabho prabhuḥ // BhStc_73 //
analyzed: naiḥspṛhyasya parām koṭim bibhratām tvam prabho prabhuḥ

original: brahmaṇo 'pi bhavān brahma kasya neśas tvam īśituḥ /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ u pi bhavān brahma kasya na īśaḥ tvam īśituḥ

original: jagatkalyāṇakalyāṇaṃ kiyat tvam iti vetti kaḥ // BhStc_74 //
analyzed: jagat kalyāṇa kalyāṇam kiyat tvam iti vetti kaḥ

original: kim anyair bandhubhiḥ kiṃ ca suhṛdbhiḥ svāmibhis tathā /
analyzed: kim anyaiḥ bandhubhiḥ kim ca suhṛdbhiḥ svāmibhiḥ tathā

original: sarvasthāne mameśa tvaṃ ya uddhartā bhavārṇavāt // BhStc_75 //
analyzed: sarva sthāne mama īśa tvam yaḥ uddhartā bhava arṇavāt

original: jayanti mohamāyādi- malasaṃkṣālanakṣamāḥ /
analyzed: jayanti moha māyā ādi mala saṃkṣālana kṣamāḥ

original: śaivayogabalākṛṣṭā divyapīyūṣavipruṣaḥ // BhStc_76 //
gāyatryā gīyate yasya dhiyāṃ tejaḥ pracodakam /
analyzed: gāyatryā gīyate yasya dhiyām tejaḥ pracodakam

original: codayed api kaccin naḥ sa dhiyaḥ satpathe prabhuḥ // BhStc_77 //
analyzed: codayet api kaccit naḥ sa dhiyaḥ sat pathe prabhuḥ

original: aṣṭamūrte kim ekasyām api mūrtau na naḥ sthitim /
analyzed: aṣṭamūrte kim ekasyām api mūrtau na naḥ sthitim

original: śāśvatīṃ kuruṣe yad vā tuṣṭaḥ sarvaṃ kariṣyasi // BhStc_78 //
analyzed: śāśvatīm kuruṣe yat vā tuṣṭaḥ sarvam kariṣyasi

original: vastutattvaṃ padārthānāṃ prāyeṇārthakriyākaram /
analyzed: vastu tattvam padārthānām prāyeṇa artha kriyā karam

original: bhavatas tv īśa nāmāpi mokṣaparyantasiddhidam // BhStc_79 //
analyzed: bhavataḥ tu īśa nāma api mokṣa paryanta siddhi dam

original: muhur muhur jagaccitrasy- -ānyānyāṃ sthitim ūhitum /
analyzed: muhur muhur jagat citrasi ā anya anyām sthitim ūhitum

original: śaktir yā te tayā nātha ko manasvī na vismitaḥ // BhStc_80 //
analyzed: śaktiḥ yā te tayā nātha kaḥ manasvī na vismitaḥ

original: duṣkaraṃ sukarīkartuṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhayituṃ tathā /
analyzed: duṣkaram sukarīkartum duḥkham sukhayitum tathā

original: ekavīrā smṛtir yasya taṃ smarāmaḥ smaradviṣam // BhStc_81 //
analyzed: eka vīrā smṛtiḥ yasya tam smarāmaḥ smara dviṣam

original: jayanti gītayo yāsāṃ sa geyaḥ parameśvaraḥ /
analyzed: jayanti gītayaḥ yāsām sa geyaḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: yannāmnāpi mahātmānaḥ kīryante pulakāṅkuraiḥ // BhStc_82 //
analyzed: yad nāmnā api mahātmānaḥ kīryante pulaka aṅkuraiḥ

original: bhavān iva bhavān eva bhaved yadi paraṃ bhava /
analyzed: bhavān iva bhavān eva bhavet yadi param bhava

original: svaśaktivyūhasaṃvyūḍha- trailokyārambhasaṃhṛtiḥ // BhStc_83 //
mantro 'si mantraṇīyo 'si mantrī tvattaḥ kuto 'paraḥ /
analyzed: mantraḥ si mantraṇīyaḥ si mantrī tvattaḥ kutas paraḥ

original: sa mahyaṃ dehi taṃ mantraṃ tvanmantraḥ syāṃ yathā prabho // BhStc_84 //
analyzed: sa mahyam dehi tam mantram tvad mantraḥ syām yathā prabho

original: bhārūpaḥ satyasaṃkalpas tvam ātmā yasya so 'py aham /
analyzed: bhā rūpaḥ satya saṃkalpaḥ tvam ātmā yasya saḥ u pi aham

original: saṃsārīti kim īśaiṣa svapnaḥ so 'pi kutas tvayi // BhStc_85 //
analyzed: saṃsārī iti kim īśa eṣa svapnaḥ saḥ u pi kutas tvayi

original: tad abhaṅgi tad agrāmyaṃ tad ekam upapattimat /
analyzed: tat abhaṅgi tat agrāmyam tat ekam upapattimat

original: tvayi karmaphalanyāsa- kṛtām aiśvaryam īśa yat // BhStc_86 //
analyzed: tvayi karma phala nyāsa kṛtām aiśvaryam īśa yat

original: kṣamaḥ kāṃ nāpadaṃ hantuṃ kāṃ dātuṃ sampadaṃ na vā /
analyzed: kṣamaḥ kām na āpadam hantum kām dātum sampadam na vā

original: yo 'sau sa dayito 'smākaṃ devadevo vṛṣadhvajaḥ // BhStc_87 //
analyzed: sa sa dayitaḥ smākam devadevaḥ vṛṣadhvajaḥ

original: māyāmayamalāndhasya divyasya jñānacakṣuṣaḥ /
analyzed: māyā maya mala andhasya divyasya jñāna cakṣuṣaḥ

original: nirmalīkaraṇe nātha tvadbhaktiḥ paramāñjanam // BhStc_88 //
analyzed: nirmalīkaraṇe nātha tvad bhaktiḥ parama añjanam

original: nirbhayaṃ yad yad ānanda- mayam ekaṃ yad avyayam /
analyzed: nirbhayam yat yat ānanda mayam ekam yat avyayam

original: padaṃ dehy ehi me deva tūrṇaṃ tat kiṃ pratīkṣase // BhStc_89 //
analyzed: padam dehi ehi me deva tūrṇam tat kim pratīkṣase

original: aho nisargagambhīro ghoraḥ saṃsārasāgaraḥ /
analyzed: aho nisarga gambhīraḥ ghoraḥ saṃsāra sāgaraḥ

original: aho tattaraṇopāyaḥ paraḥ ko 'pi maheśvaraḥ // BhStc_90 //
analyzed: aho tad taraṇa upāyaḥ paraḥ kaḥ pi maheśvaraḥ

original: namaḥ kṛtakṛtāntānta tubhyaṃ madanamardine /
analyzed: namaḥ kṛta kṛtānta anta tubhyam madana mardine

original: mastakanyastagaṅgāya yathāyuktārthakāriṇe // BhStc_91 //
analyzed: mastaka nyasta gaṅgāya yathā yukta artha kāriṇe

original: aiśvaryajñānavairāgya- dharmebhyo 'py upari sthitim /
analyzed: aiśvarya jñāna vairāgya dharmebhyaḥ pi upari sthitim

original: nātha prārthayamānānāṃ tvad ṛte kā parā gatiḥ // BhStc_92 //
analyzed: nātha prārthayamānānām tvat ṛte kā parā gatiḥ

original: tvayy anicchati kaḥ śambho śaktaḥ kubjayituṃ tṛṇam /
analyzed: tvayi an icchati kaḥ śambho śaktaḥ kubjayitum tṛṇam

original: tvadicchānugṛhītas tu vahed brāhmīṃ dhuraṃ na kaḥ // BhStc_93 //
analyzed: tvad icchā anugṛhītaḥ tu vahet brāhmīm dhuram na kaḥ

original: harapraṇatimāṇikya- mukuṭotkaṭamastakāḥ /
nameyuḥ kaṃ paraṃ kaṃ vā namayeyur na dhīdhanāḥ // BhStc_94 //
analyzed: nameyuḥ kam param kam vā namayeyuḥ na dhī dhanāḥ

original: sarvavibhramanirmoka- niṣkampam amṛtahradam /
analyzed: sarva vibhrama nirmoka niṣkampam amṛta hradam

original: bhavajjñānāmbudher madhyam adhyāsīyāpi dhūrjaṭe // BhStc_95 //
analyzed: bhavat jñāna ambudheḥ madhyam adhyāsīya api dhūrjaṭe

original: citraṃ yac citradṛṣṭo 'pi manorathagato 'pi vā /
analyzed: citram yat citra dṛṣṭaḥ pi manoratha gataḥ pi vā

original: paramārthaphalaṃ nātha paripūrṇaṃ prayacchasi // BhStc_96 //
analyzed: parama artha phalam nātha paripūrṇam prayacchasi

original: ko guṇair adhikas tvattas tvattaḥ ko nirguṇo 'dhikaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ guṇaiḥ adhikaḥ tvattaḥ tvattaḥ kaḥ nirguṇaḥ dhikaḥ

original: iti nātha numaḥ kiṃ tvāṃ kiṃ nindāmo na manmahe // BhStc_97 //
analyzed: iti nātha numaḥ kim tvām kim nindāmaḥ na manmahe

original: kīrtane 'py amṛtaughasya yatprasatteḥ phalaṃ tava /
analyzed: kīrtane pi amṛta oghasya yat prasatteḥ phalam tava

original: tat pātum api ko 'nyo 'laṃ kim u dātuṃ jagatpate // BhStc_98 //
analyzed: tat pātum api kaḥ lam kim dātum jagatpate

original: niḥśeṣaprārthanīyārtha- sārthasiddhinidhānataḥ /
analyzed: niḥśeṣa prārthanīya artha sārtha siddhi nidhānataḥ

original: tvattas tvadbhaktim evāptuṃ prārthaye nātha sarvathā // BhStc_99 //
analyzed: tvattaḥ tvad bhaktim eva āptum prārthaye nātha sarvathā

original: namas trailokyanāthāya tubhyaṃ bhava bhavajjuṣām /
analyzed: namaḥ trailokya nāthāya tubhyam bhava bhavat juṣām

original: trilokīnāthatādāna- nirvināyakaśaktaye // BhStc_100 //
niḥśeṣakleśahānasya hetuḥ ka iti saṃśaye /
analyzed: niḥśeṣa kleśa hānasya hetuḥ kaḥ iti saṃśaye

original: svāmin so 'sīti niścitya kas tvāṃ na śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // BhStc_101 //
analyzed: svāmin saḥ sī iti niścitya kaḥ tvām na śaraṇam gataḥ

original: bhuktvā bhogān bhavabhrāntiṃ hitvā lapsye paraṃ padam /
analyzed: bhuktvā bhogān bhava bhrāntim hitvā lapsye param padam

original: ity āśaṃseha śobheta śambhau bhaktimataḥ param // BhStc_102 //
analyzed: iti āśaṃsā iha śobheta śambhau bhaktimataḥ param

original: nātha svapne 'pi yat kuryāṃ brūyāṃ vā sādhv asādhu vā /
analyzed: na atha svapne yat kuryām brūyām vā sādhu asādhu vā

original: tvadadhīnatvadarpeṇa sarvatrātrāsmi nirvṛtaḥ // BhStc_103 //
analyzed: tvad adhīna tva darpeṇa sarvatra atra asmi nirvṛtaḥ

original: jyotiṣām api yaj jyotis tatra tvaddhāmni dhāvataḥ /
analyzed: jyotiṣām api yat jyotiḥ tatra tvad dhāmni dhāvataḥ

original: cittasyeśa tamaḥsparśo manye vandhyātmajānujaḥ // BhStc_104 //
analyzed: cittasya īśa tamaḥ sparśaḥ manye vandhyā ātmaja anujaḥ

original: manye nyastapadaḥ so 'pi kṣemye mokṣasya vartmani /
analyzed: manye nyasta padaḥ saḥ u pi kṣemye mokṣasya vartmani

original: manorathaḥ sthito yasya seviṣye śivam ity ayam // BhStc_105 //
analyzed: manorathaḥ sthitaḥ yasya seviṣye śivam iti ayam

original: sthityutpattilayair loka- trayasyopakriyāsv iha /
analyzed: sthiti utpatti layaiḥ loka trayasya upakriyāsu iha

original: ekaiveśa bhavacchaktiḥ svatantraṃ tantram īkṣase // BhStc_106 //
analyzed: ekā eva īśa bhavat śaktiḥ svatantram tantram īkṣase

original: trilokyām iha kas trātas tritāpyā nopatāpitaḥ /
analyzed: trilokyām iha kaḥ trātaḥ tritāpyā na upatāpitaḥ

original: tasmai namo 'stu te yas tvaṃ tannirvāṇāmṛtahradaḥ // BhStc_107 //
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ stu te yaḥ tvam tad nirvāṇa amṛta hradaḥ

original: kṛtrimāpi bhavadbhaktir akṛtrimaphalodayā /
analyzed: kṛtrimā api bhavat bhaktiḥ akṛtrima phala udayā

original: niśchadmā ced bhaved eṣā kiṃphaleti tvayocyatām // BhStc_108 //
analyzed: niśchadmā ced bhavet eṣā kiṃphalā iti tvayā ucyatām

original: tac cakṣur īkṣyase yena sā gatir gamyase yayā /
analyzed: tat cakṣuḥ īkṣyase yena sā gatiḥ gamyase yayā

original: phalaṃ tad aja jātaṃ yat tvatkathākalpapādapāt // BhStc_109 //
analyzed: phalam tat aja jātam yat tvad kathā kalpapādapāt

original: śreyasā śreya evaitad upari tvayi yā sthitiḥ /
analyzed: śreyasā śreyaḥ eva etat upari tvayi yā sthitiḥ

original: tadantarāyahṛtaye tvam īśa śaraṇaṃ mama // BhStc_110 //
analyzed: tad antarāya hṛtaye tvam īśa śaraṇam mama

original: aho svādutamaḥ śarva- sevāśaṃsāsudhārasaḥ /
analyzed: aho svādutamaḥ śarva sevā āśaṃsā sudhā rasaḥ

original: kutra kālakalāmātre na yo navanavāyate // BhStc_111 //
analyzed: kutra kāla kalā mātre na yaḥ navanavāyate

original: muhur muhur aviśrāntas trailokyaṃ kalpanāśataiḥ /
analyzed: muhur muhur aviśrāntaḥ trailokyam kalpanā śataiḥ

original: kalpayann api ko 'py eko nirvikalpo jayaty ajaḥ // BhStc_112 //
analyzed: kalpayan api kaḥ pi ekaḥ nirvikalpaḥ jayati ajaḥ

original: malatailāktasaṃsāra- vāsanāvartidāhinā /
jñānadīpena deva tvāṃ kadā nu syām upasthitaḥ // BhStc_113 //
analyzed: jñāna dīpena deva tvām kadā nu syām upasthitaḥ

original: nimeṣam api yady ekaṃ kṣīṇadoṣe kariṣyasi /
analyzed: nimeṣam api yadi ekam kṣīṇa doṣe kariṣyasi

original: padaṃ citte tadā śambho kiṃ na sampādayiṣyasi // BhStc_114 //
analyzed: padam citte tadā śambho kim na sampādayiṣyasi

original: dhanyo 'smi kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mahān asmīti bhāvanā /
analyzed: dhanyaḥ smi kṛtakṛtyaḥ smi mahān asmi iti bhāvanā

original: bhavet sālambanā tasya yas tvadālambanaḥ prabho // BhStc_115 //
analyzed: bhavet sa ālambanā tasya yaḥ tvad ālambanaḥ prabho

original: śubhāśubhasya sarvasya svayaṃ kartā bhavān api /
analyzed: śubha aśubhasya sarvasya svayam kartā bhavān api

original: bhavadbhaktis tu jananī śubhasyaiveśa kevalam // BhStc_116 //
analyzed: bhavat bhaktiḥ tu jananī śubhasya eva īśa kevalam

original: prasanne manasi svāmin kiṃ tvaṃ niviśase kim u /
analyzed: prasanne manasi svāmin kim tvam niviśase kim u

original: tvatpraveśāt prasīdet tad iti dolāyate janaḥ // BhStc_117 //
analyzed: tvad praveśāt prasīdet tat iti dolāyate janaḥ

original: niścayaḥ punar eṣo 'tra tvadadhiṣṭhānam eva hi /
analyzed: niścayaḥ punar tvad adhiṣṭhānam eva hi

original: prasādo manasaḥ svāmin sā siddhis tat paraṃ padam // BhStc_118 //
analyzed: prasādaḥ manasaḥ svāmin sā siddhiḥ tat param padam

original: vacaś cetaś ca kāryaṃ ca śarīraṃ mama yat prabho /
analyzed: vacaḥ cetaḥ ca kāryam ca śarīram mama yat prabho

original: tvatprasādena tad bhūyād bhavadbhāvaikabhūṣaṇam // BhStc_119 //
analyzed: tvad prasādena tat bhūyāt bhavat bhāva eka bhūṣaṇam

original: stavacintāmaṇiṃ bhūri- manorathaphalapradam /
analyzed: stava cintāmaṇim bhūri manoratha phala pradam

original: bhaktilakṣmyālayaṃ śambho bhaṭṭanārāyaṇo vyadhāt // BhStc_120 //
analyzed: bhakti lakṣmī ālayam śambho bhaṭṭanārāyaṇaḥ vyadhāt
